body.name: HOOBRO Bar Table, Round Pub Table, 2-Tier Bistro Table with Storage, High Top Table, Cocktail Table with Top Particleboard, for Kitchen, Living Room, Meeting Room, Rustic Brown and Black BF55BT01
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 22 mins
features: Capacious Storage Table: The 2-tier design allows you to enjoy the visible storage function of this bar table while the open shelves make everything more accessible

Stable Bar Table: Quality panels, thick metal frame plus the middle cross support make this round pub table durable. The overall trapezoidal structure can balance the stress of 4 legs and ensures the load ability of top 120 lb and of the middle 44 lb

Intimate Dining Table: Your concerns are always our considerations. The round top with smooth edge frees you from scratches. With 4 adjustable feet, this bar table can stand stable on different surfaces

All-Match Bar Table: Place this bistro table in the living room, meeting room or bar with wine and cups and savor the beauty of life with cherished companions. The collision of rustic brown and calm black creates a randomly arranged aesthetic feeling

Exactly What You Need: It is not a simple round pub table, but also represents a life attitude. The clear structure is easy to install and clean. Integrating practicality, aesthetics, and safety into one body

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sturdy table for the foyer
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this table in a rush to prepare for Thanksgiving as I was hosting this year and was afraid that I didn't have enough seats. My foyer has always been a large empty room and I wanted to add something to give it a more homey feeling but also double for seats so I decided to scope Amazon and find a cute table and chair set. I came across lots of small unstable looking tables or tiny chairs. My family are quite tall and some are stocky so I needed a set that could withstand use. I came across this table which matched my decor well and the legs were quite sturdy. I really enjoyed planning how to decorate the table as it was large enough to hold a small decoration and be able to eat at the table. It was easy to build even for a novice like me and it came very well packaged. The best thing about this table is that it is very sturdy, doesn't seem like it will easily crack under pressure. It's a decent size bar table and goes well with standard sized bar chairs or stools. When all the chairs were taken, my husband and I got to sneak away and sit at this table to eat. It was definitely worth the last minute purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 of these for a party I hosted recently. I was going to rent tables, but buying these was cheaper! They work great with or without bar stools as they are at standing height. And they took less than 10 minutes to assemble.They were very sturdy and have adjustable feet if your floor isn’t flat. They looked great (and just like the photo) with my modern farmhouse decor, and I even got several compliments about them. Didn’t even need tablecloths!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little table
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a small round bar table to put by my living room window so I could eat breakfast there. This works well. I only wish the table was a little larger. Its hard to pull up close with a stool because there is not much room for your knees to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Quality
reviews.reviewText: These tables worked well for the use. Nice suit if space and easy to assemble. I would recommend for a event hall of church fellowship hall.

reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, good instructions for assembly, love the design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, and fits our need.
reviews.reviewText: We recently moved to a new home. and had a large living room to fill. The table is perfect for our need as we wanted to create a little pub space in one part of the living room. Clear instructions, parts clearly labeled so it was so assemble and looks very sturdy. Good product, particularly at the price.
